abstract: Shares of Citigroup and Bank of America crashed through their previous 52-week lows on Friday, amid growing fears that the government might step in with a rescue plan that leaves the banks’ current shareholders with nothing.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Citigroup and Bank of America crashed through their previous 52-week lows on Friday, amid growing fears that the government might step in with a rescue plan that leaves the banks’ current shareholders with nothing.

headline.main: Shares of Big Banks Skid Lower
